Articles.Content: So I have my plugin setup but I would like to add a few more things. One of the variables in my plugin I want to be able to change in-game. can someone help me with this please.
Can you be a little more precise? How do you want it to be changeable in game?
have a box and inside the box have a text box that the user can enter in a number and click a button and the variable will be updated. or something like that.

That's still not very clear. By a "box inside the box", I guess you mean having a textbox inside a GUI window? Then take a look at the Unity documentation on GUI. You can then just set the button to change the value you want to change.

thanks i will give that a read'

edit-- works perfectly thanks for the help. i went with gui box with a slider in it so i could move it around. you are awesome
